我可以做你的社会名流
我可以是你的社交名流

sentences.sentence: She has been a socialite, actress, fashion designer and artist who married four times.
sentences.translation: 她是社交名流、演员、时装设计师和艺术家，结过四次婚。

sentences.sentence: I became a socialite on the London party scene: my circle at one point comprised thousands of girls.
sentences.translation: 我变成了伦敦派对场景上的交际之星，我的社交圈有以千计的女孩。

sentences.sentence: SHAHRYAR, a fashion-conscious young socialite from Tehran, was immensely proud of his Jackson-5-style Afro.
sentences.translation: 德黑兰的一个赶时髦的年轻社会名流，很为自己Jackson 5式的黑人发型感到骄傲。
